src:
PLN Targetkan Rasio Elektrifikasi 100% di HUT RI 2020
06 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Nurcholis Ma


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - PT PLN (Persero) menargetkan rasio elektrifikasi (RE) Indonesia mencapai 100% tepat di Hari Ulang Tahun (HUT) Kemerdekaan RI di 17 Agustus 2020 nanti. Sementara saat ini, kata Plt Direktur Utama PLN Sripeni Inten Cahyani, RE Indonesia mencapai 98,8%. Pihaknya juga sedang mengejar RE sebesar 99,3% hingga akhir 2019 nanti."Kita harus mengejar RE 99.3% di akhir tahun 2019. Posisi RE sekarang 98.8%," ujar Sripeni dalam acara penandatangan Mou PLN dengan MAB di Kantor PLN Pusat, Jakarta pada Rabu (6/11/2019),"Kami mencapai RE 100% di ulang tahun RI, tanggal 17 nanti di tahun 2020," imbuh Sripeni.Lebih lanjut Sripeni menjelaskan, selain mencapai RE 100%, pihaknya juga ingin menyelesaikan kualitas kelistrikan. Ia mencontohkan masih ada beberapa daerah yang belum teraliri listrik selama 24 jam."Kami juga harus menyelesaikan kualitas. Ada beberapa lokasi baru yang sudah kita beri sambungan listrik, namun belum 24 jam. Di pulau terpencil ada masalah infrastruktur maupun kemampuan ekonomi masyarakat," ujar Sripeni.Untuk mencapai target ini, Sripeni mengatakan meminta dukungan para stakeholder. Sebagai informasi, RE sendiri dihitung berdasarkan jumlah KK berlistrik dibagi jumlah KK Penduduk. Simak Video "Luhut ke PLN Soal SPLU: Jangan Jadi BUMN Sentris!"[Gambas:Video 20detik](akn/hns)
text:
PLN Targets 100% Electrification Ratio at 2020 RI Anniversary
Nov 6, 2019, 06:40 by Nurcholis Ma


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - PT PLN (Persero) is targeting the electrification ratio (RE) of Indonesia to reach 100% right on the Independence Day (HUT) of Indonesian Independence on 17 August 2020 later. While this time, said Acting Managing Director of PLN Sripeni Inten Cahyani, RE Indonesia reached 98.8%. "We must pursue RE 99.3% by the end of 2019." We must pursue RE 99.3% by the end of 2019. The current RE position is 98.8%, "Sripeni said at the signing of the PLN MoU with the MAB at the Central PLN Office, Jakarta in Wednesday (11/06/2019), "We achieved RE 100% on RI's birthday, on the 17th in 2020," added Sripeni. Furthermore, Sripeni explained, in addition to achieving RE 100%, his party also wanted to resolve the quality of electricity. He gave an example there are still some areas that have not been electrified for 24 hours. "We also have to complete the quality. There are several new locations that we have provided electricity connections, but have not been 24 hours. On remote islands there are problems in infrastructure and economic capacity of the community," said Sripeni. To achieve this target, Sripeni said asking for stakeholder support. For information, RE itself is calculated based on the number of households with electricity divided by the number of Households. Check out the video "Luhut to PLN about SPLU: Don't Become a Centralized SOE!" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (akn / hns)
